metadata.name: Adasept Acne Gel 12 5 g Injection powder for solution

clinical_particulars.therapeutic_indications: Indicated for sequential intravenous use with sodium nitrite for the treatment of acute cyanide poisoning that is judged to be life threatening

contraindications.pharmacodynamics: In dogs pretreatment with sodium thiosulfate to achieve a steady state level of 2 µmol mL increased the rate of conversion of cyanide to thiocyanate over 30 fold

incompatibilities.description: Thiosulfuric acid may decrease effectiveness of Technetium Tc 99m oxidronate as a diagnostic agent
The serum concentration of Magnesium can be decreased when it is combined with Thiosulfuric acid
